remarks: Wallis' formula for π :  Wallis' product converges to π / 2 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
wallispi.1 $e |- F = ( k e. NN |-> ( ( ( 2 x. k ) / ( ( 2 x. k ) - 1 ) ) x. ( ( 2 x. k ) / ( ( 2 x. k ) + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
wallispi.2 $e |- W = ( n e. NN |-> ( seq 1 ( x. , F ) ` n ) ) $.
wallispi $p |- W ~~> ( _pi / 2 ) $.
